1.description: Attic floor insulation, general air sealing, duct sealing, and drill-and-fill insulation into uninsulated wood walls

5.name: Whole-Home Electrification, High Efficiency

6.name: Whole-Home Electrification, High Efficiency + Enhanced Enclosure Package

7.description: Replace existing windows with ENERGY STAR windows for any less-efficient windows.

8.name: Lighting, Universal LEDs
